wikipedia_page.main: Augustus Charles Bickley (1857–1902) was an English journalist and author.

response: *Augustus Charles Bickley (1857–1902), British journalist, novelist, and biographer

Augustus Charles Bickley, Hudson's biographer in the Dictionary of National Biography (1895) wrote "His boldness, generosity, and almost fanatical loyalty are undoubted". John Walker wrote he was a scholar and a plain and upright Christian. cites .
